text: This article is about the notable events, related to Shumang Kumhei (), also known as Shumang Leela (), a traditional Meitei theatrical art form, happened in 2010s. == Events == === 2014 === * 30 January: 11th Shumang Leela Ningtham Kumei () was organized by Manipur State Shumang Leela Council at Iboyaima Shumang Leela Sanglen, with the participation of 13 different Shumang Leela Artist groups. === 2016 === * 7 February: Comedian Oinam Babu, better known as Ipom Babu, was remembered on his 85th birth anniversary, at Iboyaima Shumang Leela Shanglen, organised by the Shumang Leela Council and his family members. === 2017 === * 11 February: "Pakhang No. 1", a Special Show by Iramdam Manipur Artist Association (IMAA) at 45th All Manipur Shumang Leela Festival 2016-17, organized by Manipur State Kala Akademi, Imphal, at Iboyaima Shumang Leela Shanglen, Konung Mamang in Imphal. === 2019 === * 7 March: In the 47th All Manipur Shumang Leela Festival, 2018-2019, Iramdam Manipur Artist Association (IMMA) performed a play named Nipalsuba Mapok at Iboyaima Shumang Leela Shanglen, Imphal. * 10 April: Manipur State Shumang Leela Council gave the Iboyaima Award for the year 2019 to AK Bengol, a Shumang Leela director and artist. * 15 July: Ching Tam United Women's Association organized a five-day long performance of 3rd Nupi Moirang Parva Festival at Iboyaima Shumang Leela Shanglen, Palace Compound in Imphal. == References == Category:2010s Category:Theatres Category:Meitei culture
title: 2010s in Shumang Kumhei
